full_text: Knitted jumper for men in DROPS Snow. Piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with raglan and high collar. Size: S - XXXL ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #wintersprinklessweater DROPS design: Pattern ee-795 Yarn group E or C + C SIZE : S - M - L - XL – XXL - XXXL YARN : DROPS SNOW from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group E) 750-850-900-1000-1100-1200 g colour 123, Cocoa Bits NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 9 mm: Length 40 and 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 7 mm: Length 40 and 80 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 9 mm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 7 mm. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 10 stitches in width and 13 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 9 mm = 10 x 10 cm. REMEMBER: Remember that needle size is only a suggestion. If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles.
name: Ravelry: 260-13 Winter Sprinkles Sweater pattern by DROPS design
